channel.title: CVE Feed for ArmorX -- ArmorX APP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ArmorX -- ArmorX APP

item.title: CVE-2024-4303|2024-04-29T05:56:42.761Z -- ArmorX -- ArmorX APP
item.description: ArmorX Android APP's multi-factor authentication (MFA) for the login function is not properly implemented. Remote attackers who obtain user credentials can bypass MFA, allowing them to successfully log into the APP.
